title: Are we losing ancient farming practices to the current trend of corporate farming? - Quora

response.answer_text: No we are not. There are still plenty of people out there working very hard to grow the old way. And some people out there doing it the old way because it is the only option they have.  Personally I’m for the division of labor which started civilization and allowed us all to practice our specific talents. She can have this traditional farming job, poor lady.
We quit using ancient farming practices several hundred years ago. Good thing too, we would be living in the shadow of famine and starvation still if agriculture had not advanced.
